revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WZR-600 |revision=DHP |upc=747464126050 |ean= |asin=B0096239G0;US;,B0096239G0;CA; |price= |est_release_date=09/05/2012 |fcc_date=03/23/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=FDI-09101889-0 |ic_id=6102A-034 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7161 |cpu1_cspeed=680 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9223 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=106F3FXXXXXX_G,106F3FXXXXXX_A |default_ssid_regex=^106F3F[A-F0-9]{6}_G$,,,^106F3F[A-F0-9]{6}_A$ |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=10:6F:3F |oui_eth=10:6F:3F }} '''AirStation HighPower N600 Gigabit DualBand Wireless Router''' [http://www.buffalotech.com/products/wireless/dual-band-wireless-routers/airstation-highpower-n600-gigabit-dual-band-wireless-router-1 Product page]
[http://buffalo.jp/product/wireless-lan/ap/wzr-600dhp/ Product page (JP)] *This router shares the same FCC ID as the [[Buffalo WZR-HP-AG300H]]. :It presumed to be identical or very close to identical (besides the name). :The images for the device are still labeled WZR-HP-AG300H on the Buffalo site. *The default SSIDs appear to be the MAC address of the unit (with no delimiters) with a '''_A''' or '''_G''' suffix depending on the band. {{WiFiCert|WFA15471|05/23/2012}} ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=716596 On the DD-WRT forums] [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=168216 and again] :[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hpENvSU5Ryga Unboxing video from LinusTechTips] *[http://forums.buffalotech.com/t5/Wireless/WZR-600DHP-vs-WZR-HP-AG300H/td-p/107836 On the Buffalo forums] :CPU: Atheros AR7161 rev.2, 32MB Flash, 128MB RAM *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/buffalo-wzr-600dhp-airstation-highpower-n600-gigabit-2544 On SpeedGuide.net] *[http://www.amazon.com/BUFFALO-AirStation-HighPower-Wireless-WZR-600DHP/dp/B0096239G0 On Amazon] *[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833162070&name=Wireless-Routers On Newegg] ==Images== File:Lg wzr-hp-ag300h m1 lg.jpg|angled File:Wzr-hp-ag300h s1 lg.jpg|side File:Wzr-hp-ag300h c1 lg.jpg|side, layed flat File:Wzr-hp-ag300h f1 lg.jpg|front panel File:Wzr-hp-ag300h b1 lg.jpg|back, ports File:Wzr-hp-ag300h t1 lg.jpg|bottom File:Wzr-hp-ag300h c3 lg.jpg|w/ other product [[Has images::external| ]] __NOTOC__
